T16D4438:334a-35: po bzhi la blo gros kyi lang tsho mchog tu
T16D4438:334a-36: rgyas pa se dkar rigs kyi thig le 'dar pa
T16D4438:334a-37: lo ts'a ngag dbang phun tshogs lhun grub kyis bsgyur
T16D4438:334a-38: cing gso ba rig pa'i gzhung lugs la slob dpon
T16D4438:334a-39: mkhas pa bcu phrag tsam bsten nas sbyangs pa'i yar
T16D4438:334a-40: stod dar mo sman rams pa blo bzang chos grags
T16D4438:334a-41: kyis 'bad pa chen pos gtan la phab pa'o //
T16D4438:334a-42: chu gter slar yang ma bsrubs sngon med pa'i //
T16D4438:334a-43: rig byed bdud rtsi'i bum pa thob pa'i tshe //
T16D4438:334a-44: mes pos dran pa'i gso dpyad dbyar skyes kyi //
T16D4438:334a-45: rnga [?] gsangs de la mos pa cung zad lhod //
T16D4438:334b-0: ti @334b se'i mdangs ltar rab dkar lhag pa'i yid //
T16D4438:334b-1: lus can tshogs la rjes chags kunda'i tshal //
T16D4438:334b-2: 'dzum pa'i cho ga gtong min sems bskyed kyi //
T16D4438:334b-3: bsil sbyin mkhan po'i cha shas nye bar dgang //
T16D4438:334b-4: phyogs brgyar zegs ma 'thor ba kashbu ra'i //
T16D4438:334b-5: dad pas tsha gdung bcil la mtshar 'dzin na //
T16D4438:334b-6: yongs grub brgya dang rtsa gcig bro nad gnyen //
T16D4438:334b-7: sman gyi dpag bsam 'khri shing 'di sus bskrun //
T16D4438:334b-8: ris su mchad 'gro ba 'jigs bral ba'i //
T16D4438:334b-9: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs rgyal sras kyi //
T16D4438:334b-10: rlabs chen spyod la 'jug rnams sangs rgyas zhes //
T16D4438:334b-11: grags can bgrod dka'i sa de mi ring snyam //
T16D4438:334b-12: bzod min tshor ba drag po'i nad gnod dang //
T16D4438:334b-13: de rgyu sgrib gnyis lus pa med bcas pa //
T16D4438:334b-14: 'joms pa'i sman pa ches mchog rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T16D4438:334b-15: 'grub pa'i skal pa bzang por bdag 'gyur shog /
T16D4438:334b-16: tsan dan 'byug dang te'us brdeg pa la //
T16D4438:334b-17: snyoms par zhal 'che'i thugs rje snyigs dus 'dir //
T16D4438:334b-18: bskul na 'jig rten gsum gyi du:kha rnams //
T16D4438:334b-19: mkhyen brtse nus pas pha mthar mdzad du gsol //
T16D4438:334b-20: 'gro mang srog zungs bcud len bdud rtsi'i gter //
T16D4438:334b-21: myangs pa'i 'bras bu nam mkhas gzhal dka' ba'i //
T16D4438:334b-22: dge tshogs ma lus mtha' bral sems can kun //
T16D4438:334b-23: bla med byang chub 'thob pa'i rgyu ru bsngo //
T16D4438:334b-24: zhes tshe'i rig byed mtha' dag gi snying po bsdus
T16D4438:334b-25: pa'i glegs bam gyi che brjod bsgyur byang smon lam
T16D4438:334b-26: gyi rim pa 'di ni za hor gyi bande tshangs
T16D4438:334b-27: sras bzhad pa'i rdo rjes dmar ser can gyi lo
T16D4438:334b-28: khrums kyi zla ba'i dkar cha'i rgyal ba dang po'i
T16D4438:334b-29: tshes la rgyal khab chen po po ta lar sbyar
T16D4438:334b-30: ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong 'jam dbyangs grags
